name: [NES] Immunatio
description:
Help little brave leukocyte defend your host from coronavirus in this retro NES game. 

Improve your character using collected DNA points to enhance the attack, speed, and luck of your protagonist. 

Navigate through 32 unique levels with growing difficulty split into 5 different categories, such as survival, DNA collection, or virus elimination.

Use passwords to continue from the last point.

Game downloadable as a NES ROM file. Requires emulator to work ( i.e. Fceux, Mesen )
